trans-unit.source: Allows Visual Studio to communicate internally with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Consente a Visual Studio di comunicare internamente con il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref> control is browsing a COM object and the user renames the object.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"> </xref> controllo è un oggetto COM e l'utente rinomina l'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Only a change of value of the property that corresponds to DISPID_Name for the COM object raises the ComComponentNameChanged event.
trans-unit.target: Solo una modifica del valore della proprietà che corrisponde a DISPID_Name per l'oggetto COM genera l'evento ComComponentNameChanged.

trans-unit.source: Closes any open drop-down controls on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Chiude tutti i controlli elenco a discesa aperti nel <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Commits all pending changes to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il commit di tutte le modifiche in sospeso per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref> successfully commits changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"> </xref> esegue correttamente il commit delle modifiche; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Activates the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref> control when the user chooses **Properties** for a control in Design view.
trans-unit.target: Attiva il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"> </xref> controllare quando l'utente sceglie **proprietà** per un controllo nella visualizzazione progettazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref> control is currently setting one of the properties of its selected object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"> </xref> controllo imposta attualmente una delle proprietà dell'oggetto selezionato.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref> control is currently setting one of the properties of its selected object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"> </xref> controllo imposta attualmente una delle proprietà dell'oggetto selezionato; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads user states from the registry into the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Carica gli stati utente dal Registro di sistema nel <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: You can save some of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control states, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertySort%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.HelpVisible%2A> properties, to the registry and load them the next time the user runs your application.
trans-unit.target: È possibile salvare alcune delle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>controllare gli stati, ad esempio il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertySort%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.HelpVisible%2A>proprietà per il Registro di sistema e carica la volta successiva che l'utente esegue l'applicazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.HelpVisible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertySort%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>

trans-unit.source: The registry key that contains the user states.
trans-unit.target: La chiave del Registro di sistema che contiene gli stati utente.

trans-unit.source: Saves user states from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref> control to the registry.
trans-unit.target: Salva stati utente il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"> </xref> controllo nel Registro di sistema.

trans-unit.source: You can save some of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control states, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertySort%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.HelpVisible%2A> properties, to the registry and load them the next time the user runs your application.
trans-unit.target: È possibile salvare alcune delle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>controllare gli stati, ad esempio il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertySort%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.HelpVisible%2A>proprietà per il Registro di sistema e carica la volta successiva che l'utente esegue l'applicazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.HelpVisible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertySort%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>

trans-unit.source: The registry key that contains the user states.
trans-unit.target: La chiave del Registro di sistema che contiene gli stati utente.
